titleStmt.title: Catalogus librorum, tam antiquorum quam recentium in omni facultate, insignium. Rev. Rob. Whitehal, aulie novi hospitii vice-principalis nuperrime defuncti. Quorum auctio (in gratiam & commodum celeber. academ. Oxoniensis). Oxoniæ habenda est, die lunæ Martii unidecimo. 1699/700. At Mrs. Weavers dancing-school in Holywel.
titleStmt.author: West, George, fl. 1650-1707.
Crosley, John, bookseller.
Peisley, Anthony, d. 1724, bookseller.
Whitehall, Robert, 1625-1685.

notesStmt.note: Date of publication from Wing; title date given according to Lady Day dating.
Copy cataloged imperfect, lacking all after p. 38, which ends with catchword: 163 Jour-.
Booksellers' catalog for auction of the library of the late Robert Whitehall.
Copy imperfect; lacking all after p. 38; title page stained affecting legibility; margins stained and frayed.
Reproduction of the original in the Bodleian Library, Oxford.
